title: She Has Ruined My Husband’s Reputation
itunes:title: She Has Ruined My Husband’s Reputation
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a happily married Godly woman and my husband is a Godly man. We’ve been married for only 3 years but we’ve known each other since high school. After high school, I toured with a gospel choir throughout the south so I’m worldly and well-rounded for my age. After high school, my husband ended up with a great job at the hospital and he was highly respected in our church and community.................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a happily married Godly woman and my husband is a Godly man. We’ve been married for only 3 years but we’ve known each other since high school. After high school, I toured with a gospel choir throughout the south so I’m worldly and well-rounded for my age. After high school, my husband ended up with a great job at the hospital and he was highly respected in our church and community.................................
